attributes.action: TO STOP THE COUNCIL FROM THERE HEAVY HAND WAYS OFF GETTING COUNCIL TAX
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EVERY YEAR THAY HIT PEOPLE WITH CHARGES. BECAUSE THAY FEEL THAY CAN TAKE CASH FROM US WHICH WE DO NOT HAVE . THAY WASTE MORE IN ONE YEAR THEN I WILL EARN IN A MY LIFE TIME SO WAY KEEP PUTING ON CHARGES WITH COURTS  ETC .  IF PEOPLE DO NOT PAY AT THE END OFF EACH YEAR THEN DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
